Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, OCORHIST, OPERACAO, DTMOVTO, VAL_OPERACAO, SITUACAO FROM seguros.v0histsini WHERE NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND OPERACAO IN (1081, 1082, 1083, 1084, 1001, 1002, 1003, 1004, 1009) AND SITUACAO IN ('1', '5') AND situacao = '1' ORDER BY OCORHIST, OPERACAO END SQL
